channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My Wildest Avengers: Doomsday Theory Suggests One Of The Best X-Men Movies Will Be Required Viewing
item.description: One of my biggest and craziest Avengers: Doomsday movies involves one of the best X-Men movies and even more mutants than we already know about.

item.title: Tom Hiddleston Breaks His Silence On Returning To The MCU As Loki In Avengers: Doomsday
item.description: As Loki is set to return to the Marvel Cinematic Universe in Avengers: Doomsday, Tom Hiddleston is finally opening up about his next appearance.

item.title: Edward Norton's A Complete Unknown Role Almost Didn't Happen
item.description: Edward Norton's performance as Peter Seeger was one of the best things about James Mangold's A Complete Unknown, but it almost didn't happen.

item.title: D.L. Hughley Rips Bill Maher for Visiting President Trump at White House
item.description: D.L. Hughley is ripping Bill Maher for breaking bread with President Trump at the White House ... and he says they're sounding a little too similar th...

item.title: Hawk Tuah Goes Hollywood, Films Cameo for Glen Powell's Show 'Chad Powers'
item.description: Hawk Tuah’s back on the grind after that crypto mess -- and she's made her way to Hollywood for a cameo in Glen Powell’s new Hulu series "Chad Powers,...

item.title: Paris Hilton's 'Unforgettable' Fam Vacay to Hawaii ... Aloha!

item.title: Ohio Teacher Who Pled Guilty to Sex With Student Claims Husband Neglected Her
item.description: An Ohio teacher who was convicted of having sex with an underage student has accused her estranged husband of "extreme cruelty" amid their divorce, TM...

item.title: Britney Spears Blasts Fake Jealous Friends for Criticizing Her Looks
